attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the forth bridge fiasco. how can it happen.
attributes.background: Debate how a piece of critical infrastructure can be forced to close due to failures in its structure , which have been know about for at least 5 years.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
